User Logs¶

This is a core module found in kolibri/logger.

  • Concepts and Definitions
  • Implementation Details

Models¶

This app is intended to provide the core functionality for tracking user engagement with content and Kolibri in general. As such, it is intended to store details of user interactions with content, a summary of those interactions, interactions with the software in general, as well as user feedback on the content and the software.

class kolibri.logger.models.ContentInteractionLog(*args, **kwargs)[fuente]

This model provides a record of an interaction with a content item.

Parámetros:
  • id (AutoField) – Id
  • user_id (ForeignKey to ~) – User
  • content_id (UUIDField) – Content id
  • channel_id (UUIDField) – Channel id
  • start_timestamp (DateTimeField) – Start timestamp
  • completion_timestamp (DateTimeField) – Completion timestamp
  • item_session (UUIDField) – Item session
  • kind (CharField) – Kind
  • extra_fields (TextField) – Extra fields
class kolibri.logger.models.ContentRatingLog(*args, **kwargs)[fuente]

This model provides a record of user feedback on a content item.

Parámetros:
  • id (AutoField) – Id
  • user_id (ForeignKey to ~) – User
  • content_id (UUIDField) – Content id
  • channel_id (UUIDField) – Channel id
  • quality (IntegerField) – Quality
  • ease (IntegerField) – Ease
  • learning (IntegerField) – Learning
  • feedback (TextField) – Feedback
class kolibri.logger.models.ContentSummaryLog(*args, **kwargs)[fuente]

This model provides a summary of all interactions of a user with a content item.

Parámetros:
  • id (AutoField) – Id
  • user_id (ForeignKey to ~) – User
  • content_id (UUIDField) – Content id
  • channel_id (UUIDField) – Channel id
  • start_timestamp (DateTimeField) – Start timestamp
  • last_activity_timestamp (DateTimeField) – Last activity timestamp
  • completion_timestamp (DateTimeField) – Completion timestamp
  • progress (DecimalField) – Progress
  • kind (CharField) – Kind
  • extra_fields (TextField) – Extra fields
class kolibri.logger.models.UserSessionLog(*args, **kwargs)[fuente]

This model provides a record of a user session in Kolibri.

Parámetros:
  • id (AutoField) – Id
  • user_id (ForeignKey to ~) – User
  • channels (TextField) – Channels
  • start_timestamp (DateTimeField) – Start timestamp
  • completion_timestamp (DateTimeField) – Completion timestamp
  • pages (TextField) – Pages
